interactions.Alarm:

The user has maintained her preferred 6:30 AM weekday wake-up time using the nature sounds for several years now. She occasionally experiments with new nature sound options provided by the assistant but always returns to her favorite gentle nature melody.

Her interactions are typically straightforward but tinged with a warm pleasantness. The user seems to view the assistant as a helpful routine companion for her morning wakeup needs.
